query: mutation createRegion($command: CreateRegionCommandInput!) {  createRegion(command: $command) {  ...region  __typename  } }  fragment region on Region {  reference  name  financialDimension {  ...financialDimension  __typename  }  createdBy  createdOn  updatedBy  updatedOn  __typename }  fragment financialDimension on FinancialDimension {  reference  code  description  target  dimensionType  createdBy  createdOn  updatedBy  updatedOn  __typename }
